id: เช็คขอมูลmaya-pycmชุดเคมี_Query1

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT DISTINCT * 
FROM model 
WHERE 
  code LIKE CONCAT('%', {{Input1.text}}, '%') 
  OR dcode LIKE CONCAT('%', {{Input1.text}}, '%') 
  OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', {{Input1.text}}, '%') 
LIMIT 100;
